pr_title: Add the possibility to inject a custom RecoveryState factory to IndexStorePlugin implementations

timeline.message:
Add the possibility to inject a custom RecoveryState factory.

Add a custom factory for recovery state into IndexStorePlugin that
allows different implementors to provide its own RecoveryState
implementation.

timeline.bodyText: Can we lose this override? It looks only to be used in one test that could use the default recovery state factory anyway.

timeline.bodyText:
I think we shouldn't be asserting that our recovery factories have a toString() that returns org.elasticsearch.plugins.IndexStorePluginTests$RecoveryFactory@[\\w\\d]+: the fact that the message contains the duplicated key (and the string Duplicate key) should be enough IMO.
Bit of a pain the message doesn't contain the key in Java 8 but such is life.
